Hi Ohan,

Occured when I tried to debug the project- HiDef profile been used.

No suitable graphics card found

Could not find a suitable direct3D devie that supports the XNA framework HiDef profile

When I use Reach profile it says 

Error 2 XNA Framework Reach profile does not support vertex shader model 3.0. E:\GoblinXNA v4\GoblinXNAv4.0\data\Shaders\SimpleShadowShader.fx Tutorial8 - Optical Marker Tracking - Windows

 

How can I solve this in either way?

You either need to get a better graphics card, or turn off the shadow (comment scene.ShadowMap line) since shadow can only work with shader model 3.0 or above.

Ohan
